text: Jo emin sudaed az in ki ʙori digar sumoro ʙa darjo ʙozgardonad va tufoni tundi kistisikan ʙar sumo ʙifiristad va ʙa xotiri nosukrguzorie, ki varzidaed, ƣarqaton sozad? Ba'd az on kasero najoʙed, ki dar ʙaroʙari on ci ʙo sumo kardaem az Mo intiqom ʙigirad. Hamono Alloh ʙa andozai zarrae ʙar sumo sitam nakardaast
